text: Île-de-France (pronounced Eel-de-frans) is a region of France. The capital city is Paris. It is also the capital city of France. In 2013 about 12 million people lived in the region. About 2.1 million people live in the city of Paris. There are 8 departments in the region. They are: *Essonne *Hauts-de- Seine *Paris *Seine-et-Marne *Seine-Saint-Denis *Val-d'Oise *Val-de-Marne *Yvelines
title: Île-de-France
